FuncDef: This command specifies BGP or PIM, for PE-to-PE signaling of CE multicast states. When this command is set to PIM and neighbor discovery by BGP is disabled, PIM peering will be enabled on the inclusive tree.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies to use BGP for PE-to-PE signaling of CE multicast states. Auto-discovery must be enabled.
Specifies to use PIM for PE-to-PE signaling of CE multicast states.
